import React ,{useState}from "react" import {updateData} from './redux/action.js' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; const Mood = ({el}) =>{ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [item,setItem]=useState({ nom:el.nom, prenom:el.prenom }) const[newItem,setNewItem]=useState({ id:el.id, nom:'', prenom:'' }) const updata = ()=>{ dispatch(updateData(newItem.id,newItem.nom,newItem.prenom)) } return(
Modal title
